title: NTPC-NPCIL joint venture likely to invest Rs 50,400 cr in 2,800 MW nuclear power plant
description: NTPC Ltd and the Nuclear Power Corporation of India are likely to invest around Rs 50,400 crore in the 2,800 MW Mahi-Banswara nuclear power plant, which will be jointly developed by the two state-owned companies. The power generator expects the tendering process for the nuclear power project to start in the current financial year.
